Uses of Class
com.fasterxml.clustermate.api.RequestPathBuilder

  • Packages that use RequestPathBuilder 
    Package Description
    com.fasterxml.clustermate.api
    Main shared (used by client and server components) types of ClusterMate system.
    com.fasterxml.clustermate.client
    Main public types for ClusterMate client module; most important of which is NetworkClient that is the object application code uses to access data in the logical distributed Store.
    com.fasterxml.clustermate.client.ahc  
    com.fasterxml.clustermate.client.cluster
    Package that contains client-side abstractions that deal with state of server, including rudimentary information about possible server clusters.
    com.fasterxml.clustermate.client.jdk  
    com.fasterxml.clustermate.dw
    Package that contains basic components needed to run a ClusterMate-based service on DropWizard container.
    com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.cluster  
    com.fasterxml.clustermate.std
    Standard implementations for some of public interfaces ClusterMate exposes: currently mostly implementations for simple HTTP access using JDK-provided HTTP client functionality.

      Methods in com.fasterxml.clustermate.api that return RequestPathBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract RequestPathBuilder RequestPathBuilder.addParameter(String key, String value)
      Method that will add a single query parameter in the logical path, with given value.
      abstract RequestPathBuilder RequestPathBuilder.addPathSegment(String segment)
      Method that will append a single path segment, escaping characters as necessary, including escaping of slash character so that the whole value remains parseable path segment.
      RequestPathBuilder RequestPathBuilder.addPathSegments(String[] segments)
      Convenience method for appending a sequence of path segments, as if calling addPathSegment(String) once per segment, in the order indicated.
      abstract RequestPathBuilder RequestPathBuilder.addPathSegmentsRaw(String segments)
      Method that will append one or more path segments; contents are only escaped only for mandatory characters, but slashes are NOT escaped, so input may contain multiple segments
      abstract RequestPathBuilder RequestPath.builder()
      Factory method for creating builder instance that can be used for building a more refined path, given this instance as the base.
